key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on semiconductors and electronic components
Economic sensitivity tied to the cyclical manufacturing sector
Geopolitical risks from exposure to international markets, particularly China
Intense competitive pressures from other machine vision providers
Legal disputes and ethical concerns, including allegations of unjust enrichment and sexual harassment
controversies: Legal disputes related to supply chain disruptions and force majeure clauses
Allegations of unjust enrichment and sexual harassment
Claims of retaining customer bases built by former partners after terminating distribution agreements
environmental_issues: Increasing scrutiny related to ESG factors, including potential environmental liabilities
social_issues: Reputational risks from legal and ethical controversies
Potential social impacts from supply chain disruptions and workforce issues
governance_issues: Management of ESG expectations and investor confidence
Governance challenges related to legal disputes and ethical concerns
